name: Fox Hunter Game 2016 - Real Animal Hunt Shooting for free
name_original: Fox Hunter Game 2016 - Real Animal Hunt Shooting for free
description:
Fox Sniper Shooting is about sniper hunting in the wild jungles of remote areas if the country. In the beginning it was a simple hunting for food as we were on the survival missions in the jungle . As long as we were moving forward for the more hunting and fun we were unconsciously getting into deadly trouble as we got trap into the deadly and hungry fox .

A large group of fox has surrounded us and now we have no option but eliminate them all and survive . We are real in need of a character of bravely and hero or maybe a commando! who can save us from these wild animals.

So, show yourself as a best sniper shooter by sniper shooting all wild fox and get rid from them.
